apis.description:
Using 'default' as the template_id should suffice for the current implmentation (as there should be only one template per course).
However, using specific template ids may become necessary in the future

operations.notes:
Using 'default' as the template_id should suffice for the current implmentation (as there should be only one template per course).
However, using specific template ids may become necessary in the future

apis.description: Returns a list of courses that are configured to receive updates from this blueprint

operations.notes: Returns a list of courses that are configured to receive updates from this blueprint

apis.description:
Send a list of course ids to add or remove new associations for the template.
Cannot add courses that do not belong to the blueprint course's account. Also cannot add
other blueprint courses or courses that already have an association with another blueprint course.

After associating new courses, {api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#queue_migration start a sync} to populate their contents from the blueprint.

operations.notes:
Send a list of course ids to add or remove new associations for the template.
Cannot add courses that do not belong to the blueprint course's account. Also cannot add
other blueprint courses or courses that already have an association with another blueprint course.

After associating new courses, {api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#queue_migration start a sync} to populate their contents from the blueprint.

parameters.name: course_ids_to_add
parameters.description: Courses to add as associated courses

parameters.name: course_ids_to_remove
parameters.description: Courses to remove as associated courses

apis.description:
Begins a migration to push recently updated content to all associated courses.
Only one migration can be running at a time.

operations.summary: Begin a migration to push to associated courses
operations.notes:
Begins a migration to push recently updated content to all associated courses.
Only one migration can be running at a time.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: An optional comment to be included in the sync history.

parameters.name: send_notification
parameters.description: Send a notification to the calling user when the sync completes.

parameters.name: copy_settings
parameters.description:
Whether course settings should be copied over to associated courses.
Defaults to true for newly associated courses.

parameters.name: publish_after_initial_sync
parameters.description: If set, newly associated courses will be automatically published after the sync completes

apis.description: If a blueprint course object is restricted, editing will be limited for copies in associated courses.

operations.summary: Set or remove restrictions on a blueprint course object
operations.notes: If a blueprint course object is restricted, editing will be limited for copies in associated courses.

parameters.name: restrictions
parameters.description:
(Optional) If the object is restricted, this specifies a set of restrictions. If not specified,
the course-level restrictions will be used. See {api:CoursesController#update Course API update documentation}

apis.description:
Retrieve a list of learning objects that have changed since the last blueprint sync operation.
If no syncs have been completed, a ChangeRecord with a change_type of +initial_sync+ is returned.

operations.notes:
Retrieve a list of learning objects that have changed since the last blueprint sync operation.
If no syncs have been completed, a ChangeRecord with a change_type of +initial_sync+ is returned.

apis.description:
Shows a paginated list of migrations for the template, starting with the most recent. This endpoint can be called on a
blueprint course. See also {api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#imports_index the associated course side}.

operations.notes:
Shows a paginated list of migrations for the template, starting with the most recent. This endpoint can be called on a
blueprint course. See also {api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#imports_index the associated course side}.

apis.description:
Shows the status of a migration. This endpoint can be called on a blueprint course. See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#imports_show the associated course side}.

operations.notes:
Shows the status of a migration. This endpoint can be called on a blueprint course. See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#imports_show the associated course side}.

apis.description:
Show the changes that were propagated in a blueprint migration. This endpoint can be called on a
blueprint course. See also {api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#import_details the associated course side}.

operations.notes:
Show the changes that were propagated in a blueprint migration. This endpoint can be called on a
blueprint course. See also {api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#import_details the associated course side}.

apis.description: Returns a list of blueprint subscriptions for the given course. (Currently a course may have no more than one.)

operations.notes: Returns a list of blueprint subscriptions for the given course. (Currently a course may have no more than one.)

apis.description:
Shows a paginated list of migrations imported into a course associated with a blueprint, starting with the most recent. See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#migrations_index the blueprint course side}.

Use 'default' as the subscription_id to use the currently active blueprint subscription.

operations.notes:
Shows a paginated list of migrations imported into a course associated with a blueprint, starting with the most recent. See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#migrations_index the blueprint course side}.

Use 'default' as the subscription_id to use the currently active blueprint subscription.

apis.description:
Shows the status of an import into a course associated with a blueprint. See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#migrations_show the blueprint course side}.

operations.notes:
Shows the status of an import into a course associated with a blueprint. See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#migrations_show the blueprint course side}.

apis.description:
Show the changes that were propagated to a course associated with a blueprint.  See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#migration_details the blueprint course side}.

operations.notes:
Show the changes that were propagated to a course associated with a blueprint.  See also
{api:MasterCourses::MasterTemplatesController#migration_details the blueprint course side}.

course_id.description: The ID of the Course the template belongs to.

last_export_completed_at.description: Time when the last export was completed

associated_course_count.description: Number of associated courses for the template

template_id.description: The ID of the template the migration belongs to. Only present when querying a blueprint course.

subscription_id.description: The ID of the associated course's blueprint subscription. Only present when querying a course associated with a blueprint.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who queued the migration.

workflow_state.description: Current state of the content migration: queued, exporting, imports_queued, completed, exports_failed, imports_failed

created_at.description: Time when the migration was queued

imports_queued_at.description: Time when the exports were completed and imports were queued

imports_completed_at.description: Time when the imports were completed

comment.description: User-specified comment describing changes made in this operation
comment.example: Fixed spelling in question 3 of midterm exam

BlueprintRestriction.description: A set of restrictions on editing for copied objects in associated courses

content.description: Restriction on main content (e.g. title, description).

points.description: Restriction on points possible for assignments and graded learning objects

due_dates.description: Restriction on due dates for assignments and graded learning objects

availability_dates.description: Restriction on availability dates for an object

ChangeRecord.description: Describes a learning object change propagated to associated courses from a blueprint course

asset_id.description: The ID of the learning object that was changed in the blueprint course.

asset_type.description: The type of the learning object that was changed in the blueprint course.  One of 'assignment', 'attachment', 'discussion_topic', 'external_tool', 'quiz', 'wiki_page', 'syllabus', or 'settings'.  For 'syllabus' or 'settings', the asset_id is the course id.

asset_name.description: The name of the learning object that was changed in the blueprint course.

change_type.description: The type of change; one of 'created', 'updated', 'deleted'

html_url.description: The URL of the changed object

locked.description: Whether the object is locked in the blueprint

exceptions.description: A list of ExceptionRecords for linked courses that did not receive this update.

ExceptionRecord.description: Lists associated courses that did not receive a change propagated from a blueprint

course_id.description: The ID of the associated course

conflicting_changes.description: A list of change classes in the associated course's copy of the item that prevented a blueprint change from being applied. One or more of ['content', 'points', 'due_dates', 'availability_dates'].

BlueprintSubscription.description: Associates a course with a blueprint

id.description: The ID of the blueprint course subscription

template_id.description: The ID of the blueprint template the associated course is subscribed to
